TopicTitle: who is your favorite kerman besides jebediah, bill and bob.

Articles.Content:
who is it and why?

mine is Henmin Kerman because he survived too much crashes:D.

we all love special agent Kirrim, always screaming while flying properly and then laughing during crash...

he even got recognized by the dev team, http://youtu.be/dlbHmsHOe-U?t=37s .

My old favorite was Hadlie Kerman, my new fav is Bartrie.

wait there's already a thread for this somewhere (no don't link it, we don't need more necros...)

Hate Jeb, Bill, and Bob.

I always go into persistence.sfs and change them to Sigly, Adley and Dilfred
I know kirrim he is an awesome secret agent:D
Verhner von something.

Frank. After every improbably-successful mission I've pulled off, I end up looking down in the lower right of my screen to see him smiling. Most of the time I never even knew he was there.

He's my Jeb.
lemfred kerman. I send him to every dangerous mission,Hoping he will fail,but he always succeed.
I name my Kerbals after my viewers, so they're all my favorite! Though H.M Kerman the 5th has a special place.
It's got to be Luger. Badass name, and he smiles during every mission, regardless of the condition. Not a badass though...could be attributed to a full courage bar and near empty stupidity bar.

Jim, Mac and Gus.

All happen to have actual names that dont sound ridiculous so they get the actual missions.

Enory Kerman. My first Kerbal to land on the Mun. Also the first to get stranded there. Also first (with his lifetime friend Gerbles) to start my colony on Laythe back in .21. He is now currently smiling away as he tests my newest creations at KSC .

Edited March 21, 2014 by Avera9eJoe
My favorite will always be my kustom Kerbal, the one I place into all my save games. Max Kerman. Egocentricity FTW
Merman Kerman.
German Kerman

I like all of my little guys. I make sure each one gets to do something cool occasionally. Bob did my first successful orbit. Jeb did my first Munar flyby. Bill did my first Minmus flyby.

Of the non-original three, Donby took my first jet to the north pole and survived a crazy rocket disintegration early in my career game, so he's my 'lucky' one. Jonnie Kerman on the other hand, managed a 1.5 km spacewalk between two ships that hadn't had their orbits entirely matched (I hadn't learned to do that yet and had to rescue him), so I give him the really crazy assignments.

I also have a Jennie Kerman.

She looks like a Guy but I take care of her. Seems like she is the ONLY Girl and the Guys would hate me if I crash her.

Billy Boblong, He's always been on my Thor lander missions, and my Kethane mining missions.

He's come back from all of them in one peace, no matter the odds.

He was also the first Kerbal of mine to ever set foot on Minmus in the heavy Kethane mining lander, was an emotional moment for both of us...
It's a tie between Munman Kerman and Patton Kerman-the kerbal that's afraid of everything

Lenman, like Lensman

He is my Designated non-rocket pilot
Capt. Kirk! Much dumber than the original and almost as courageous! Honorable mention to Chuck, first Kerbal to break the speed of sound, although he had to be forcefully strapped into the aircraft
I have a few guys that are commonly found on my missions: Kelrie and Gerrim are two of the names, but there are quite a few that I can't think of right now.
Mine is Lars Kerman, test pilot who never smiled, never screamed, right now he is the commander of a laythe base.

I don't really have any favorites, but some of mine have gotten "jobs" based on how their missions in my career have gone so far:

Milbert: Pilot

Wilzer: Station Commander (the bossy one)

Adlas & Donbal: Science Team

Cortrey, Ering, & Greglock: The Other Trio

If I had to pick one though, I'd say Milbert. Nobody flies better than Milbert.
One day, Billy-Bobster Kerman decided to apply for a job. He got it purely because of his name.
Hard to decide. Either Doodley or Fredberry.
